gpt_comment: ⚠️[DIVERGENT] Forecast conflict with Meteoblue showing a slight rainfall. Meteoblue: 0-0.1" rain vs baseline 18% rain. Just like a gazelle swiftly adapts to changes in its environment, you may want to adjust your plans and consider carrying an umbrella.
